description:
Keep your fingers warm and dry during your rainy commute. The waterproof-breathable membrane ensures your hands won't get soaked, and the synthetic-blend inner liner keeps you sweat-free.

  • Outer fabric is wear-resistant nylon knit with a bonded Artex waterproof-breathable membrane
  • Moisture-wicking CoolMax blend liner keeps hands dry
  • Silicone print on palm keeps grip even in wet conditions
  • Low-profile fit and an ergonomic fit for finger dexterity
  • As of 2020 Showers Pass is Climate Neutral certified, meaning they fully offset their carbon emissions. Climate Neutral certified is a consumer label that's carried by brands who take responsibility for greenhouse gas emissions generated in production, operation and shipping of their goods and services
name: Showers Pass Crosspoint Waterproof Knit Gloves - Unisex
